Title: Provides for state assistance to local governments for the enforcement of fire prevention and building codes
Summary: Provides for state assistance to local governments for the enforcement of fire prevention and building codes using monies paid into the code enforcement account.
LawCode: Amd ยง9108, Ins L; amd ยง54-g, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the state finance law, in relation to providing for state assistance to local governments for the enforcement of fire prevention and building codes
